definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: The ions in TATB are with positive and negative charges in turns.
sentences.chinese: 整个TATB分子上面离子的净电荷是正负相间的。

sentences.english: I had made a special pouch for her, red and green with white lace.
sentences.chinese: 我为她做的小袋很特别，红绿相间镶着白边。

sentences.english: Bertha is a cute brown and white bear.
sentences.chinese: 柏莎是一只可爱的棕白相间的熊。

sentences.english: When I wake, a tatter of blue and green beneath my nails.
sentences.chinese: 我醒来的时候，我指甲下有一缕蓝绿相间的碎布纤维。

sentences.english: The one on the far right, with long, black-and-white hair, is Buddie .
sentences.chinese: 最右边有着长长的黑白相间的毛的那只是布迪。

sentences.english: A large brown and black dog, with a serious expression.
sentences.chinese: 一只棕黑相间的大狗，带着严肃的表情。

sentences.english: He long with black and white cat, as well as a pair of round Yo's big eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他长着黑白相间的猫，还有一双圆溜溜的大眼睛。

sentences.english: Those children are always quarreling among themselves .
sentences.chinese: 那些小孩子互相间老是吵吵闹闹。

sentences.english: I had made a special pouch for her, red and GREen with white lace.
sentences.chinese: 我为她做的小袋很非凡，红绿相间还镶着白边。

sentences.english: We often practice speaking English among ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 我们经常互相间练习讲英语。

sentences.english: Her coat is blue and yellow.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着蓝黄相间的外套。

sentences.english: He wore a skintight black and yellow outfit covered with advertisements.
sentences.chinese: 罗伯特身穿黄黑相间的紧身外衣，上面印有广告。

sentences.english: The red lionfish sports maroon and white stripes to complement its venomous spines.
sentences.chinese: 红狮子鱼褐白相间的条纹真是为它的毒刺锦上添花。

sentences.english: The evening sky flamed with red and orange.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚天空的颜色是一片火红和橘黄相间。

sentences.english: The pork is cut into 2-inch squares of both fat and lean meat with the skin left on.
sentences.chinese: 肥瘦相间的猪肉被切成2英寸见方的肉块，保留猪皮。

sentences.english: Left dry throat pain, cough, sputum color white yellow.
sentences.chinese: 咽喉左侧干疼，伴有咳嗽，白黄相间色痰。
